body: Hi, As far as I have seen the analysis period doesn't work when the first hour is bigger than the second, it flips them. Probably I do it quite complex, but it has worked for me. Delete the analysis period and then create a subset list with the period you are interested in of the data that the adaptive chart asks for (only the numbers, do not add the strings)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ycvwLIslca4u*vKA-oKy1O*P2YlFjBbTLMiTNxH9Sjk*zCh2VkbJr52U-6EKU*coOiRL-kfpwRbJdJi2UmU7eSw9VH5fv-3a/selectpreiod.PNG) Probably someone else will tell you an easier way.
